hero.subtitle: Create your bot in 10 minutes and start accepting appointments today!
hero.description: Bookly is a modern appointment management system with unique Telegram bot integration. Perfect for clinics, beauty salons, consultants, and any service business.

bot.greeting: Hi! 👋 I will help you book an appointment. Choose a service:

pricing.title: Simple and Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose a plan that fits your business

contact.title: Need a custom plan?
contact.text: Contact us to discuss enterprise solutions and special terms.

q1.title: Can I change my plan?
q1.text: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes take effect in the next billing cycle.

q2.title: Is there a trial period?
q2.text: Yes, paid plans include a 14-day trial with no commitment.

q3.title: What if I exceed limits?
q3.text: We will notify you in advance. You can upgrade or purchase additional appointments.

q4.title: What payment methods are available?
q4.text: We accept credit cards, PayPal and bank transfers for corporate clients.

testimonial1.text: Bookly has completely changed how our clinic works. Now 80% of appointments come through our Telegram bot!
testimonial1.author: Dr. Anna Petrova

testimonial2.text: Very convenient! Clients book themselves, and I get notifications. Saves tons of time.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about Bookly

contact.title: Didn't find an answer?
contact.subtitle: Our support team is here to help 24/7

q1.question: How long does setup take?
q1.answer: Full system setup takes only 10-15 minutes. We provide step-by-step instructions with pictures.

q2.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
q2.answer: No! Our system is designed for regular users. All actions are intuitive.

q3.question: Can I use it on mobile?
q3.answer: Yes! We have a responsive admin panel and Telegram Web App for mobile management.

q4.question: Are there client limits?
q4.answer: Free plan includes up to 50 appointments per month. Paid plans have virtually no limits.

q5.question: Can I integrate with other systems?
q5.answer: Yes, we have API for integration with CRM, calendars, and other systems.
